pullrequest.title: Generalised globals diff implementation to permit command line comparison of two shot files

content.raw:
Hey Russ,

I pulled from MonashSpinor, backed out the sineramp_invert commit and pushed, so as to update this pull request to only include the globals diff changes, and so now it doesn't contain the sineramp_invert thing I'll merge.
